Platform Ops & Cloud Native

Deliver business value with big data and machine learning

Data Engineering and Management to support machine learning with a focus on collecting, cleansing, transforming, and governing new and big data for analysis.

There are two approaches in Machine Learning:

Supervised where the system is given the desired target and learns to predict the same outcome based on attributes

Unsupervised where there are no predefined outcomes, and once trained, the model is tested against additional data to make sure the model is valid.

We are passionate about putting data to work and solve your toughest problems. We teach you how to apply data engineering and Build production-ready data Infrastructure, Data Warehouse & Data Lakes. Application developed through machine learning aims to deliver next generation mobility solutions that would effectively be part of mobility infrastructure.

The Latest Technology

Hexad always keeps track of new technologies to deliver advanced enterprise software solutions. The latest technology gives you many crucial benefits, from the highest level of security with blockchain — to reliable automation with Artificial Intelligence based algorithms like machine learning.

We can help you to strengthen your organization data

We focus on comprehensive framework and harvesting of big data. Our data engineers create interfaces and mechanism for the flow and access of information. Our engineers are expert in System architecture, programming, database design and configuration, interface and sensor configuration.
